page.title: 18A SCHOOL NURSE
page.content: Mrs.Johnstone works with children from 4 years to 16 years,and she enjoys her work.Her job isn't well paid in comparison with jobs in industry requiring much less training,however she doesn't do her job because of the money,but because the job gives her satisfaction.The main aspects of her job are the prevention of major health problems ,checking vision and hearing and hygiene problems.She travels a lot using a car provided by her employers. She covers the whole of Yeovil and a wide area for the BCG programmme.She works for the Somerset Area Health Authority,and she is based at the Preston Road Clinic in Yeovil.She is a State Registered Nurse with a wide experience in the community.
